en.today: Measure your expectations of others, dear Aries, as Venus and Uranus square off. People will feel more sensitive about their flaws or mistakes, and offering unsolicited advice or criticism could cut deeper than you'd anticipated. Meanwhile, the moon continues through Virgo, asking you to lend a hand if you see a friend in need. Just be mindful to stay on top of your own agenda and aspirations, especially when the nodes of fate stir later this afternoon. Nurture growth this evening while Jupiter stirs, putting Love into the goals and relationships that matter most. Know your limits and invest in healthy routines as the sun opposes Saturn tonight.

en.today: Recognize if you're overdue for some rest and pampering, darling Gemini, as Venus and Uranus square off. Luckily, the Virgo moon grants full permission to stay home, though you'll crave a certain level of productivity. Catch up on self-care routines and household duties, finding a flow that offers relaxation and a sense of accomplishment. Money-making ideas could see you once the nodes of fate and Jupiter stir, so try not to push your dreams to the side. Pull back and visualize your long-term aspirations while the sun opposes Saturn later tonight.
